BTNotification is required to send applications\' notifications to your remote device. Press "OK" to go to the Accessibility settings to activate it.
Mediatek SmartDevice is required to send applications\' notifications to your remote device. Press "OK" to go to the Notification access settings to activate it.
Active notification service in your accessibility setting. This allows BT notification to push application notification to remote device.
